post.body: LMAO! Saw him last night and got that damn song stuck in my head too! I <3 Bruuuuce!!
Toy Train store in Costa Mesa off of Baker.
Now you'll see the dilemma between Tweeting or updating your Facebook.
haha, thought you were serious, so was just letting you have your opinion!
Who is "she" and was it mma or boxing??
I now have a birthday goal for 60!!
http://twitpic.com/usx1 - Tofu Meatballs at GR Eats in LA.
Getting ready to go see Bruce Campbell and his movie "My Name Is Bruce"!!
I'm broken hearted! At the Honda dealership and NO DONUTS!!
Why is it when ever I start to get a headache, my fricken coworker busts out the super giant stinky marker? I can feel it in my brain!
Beautifully clear day in downtown LA and we can even see the Hollywood sign! Here for the Kings game!
http://twitpic.com/qs1l - Just doing a little knife sharpening on a lovely afternoon.
http://twitpic.com/onf0 - Happy ~~ Day!!!
ZOMG!! My girlfriend wants to play WOW!! Pen & Paper D&D can't be far behind!
http://twitpic.com/nmg5 - At Dodger stadium for Meet the Kings event
Finally saw the Swedish vampire flick "Let the Right One In"!! SEE IT!!! NOW!! http://bit.ly/1ckyAx
http://twitpic.com/mmi0 - Chewy, get us out of here!
Not liking the 90+ temp in mid November. FIRE BAD!!
10% lay offs at work today. 150 people. Ashley & I are safe, but saying good bye to a lot of good friends. :(
What an amazingly beautiful weekend we had here in So Cal. Could see the mnts and Catalina with no smog in the way!
